channel.title: Python on E | M
channel.description: Recent content in Python on E | M

item.title: HackerNews Analysis
item.description: The analysis is on HACKER NEWS dataset that is a set of about 400 stories with more than 100 points on Hacker News. The goal is to use MongoDB with Python to resolve specific queries. Read more on GitHub

item.title: Predictive Word System
item.description: The text prediction for a particular user’s texting or typing saves a lot of time by understanding the user’s patterns of texting. The work aims to obtain a simple “predictive word system” by learning from “I promessi sposi” . Read more on GitHub
